description: Valid single offer with correct OfferRefID and OwnerCode returns total price
test_steps: Prepare OfferPriceRQ payload with SelectedOfferList containing one SelectedOffer
Set OfferRefID to 'a2716059-ee3b-487c-8a63-d72a8c7810a7|am9f9wivlT9SV0Wd7zNRI7001'
Set OwnerCode to 'VS'
Include three SelectedOfferItem elements with valid OfferItemRefID and PaxRefID combinations
Send POST request to OfferPriceRQ endpoint
expected_result: HTTP 200 OK with PricedOffer containing total price for the selected offer

description: Valid multiple offers with correct OfferRefIDs and OwnerCodes return total prices
test_steps: Prepare OfferPriceRQ payload with SelectedOfferList containing two SelectedOffer elements
Set first OfferRefID to 'a2716059-ee3b-487c-8a63-d72a8c7810a7|am9f9wivlT9SV0Wd7zNRI7001' and OwnerCode to 'VS'
Set second OfferRefID to 'b3827160-ff4c-598d-9b74-e83b9d8920b8|bn0g0gwjuU0TW1Xe8OSJ8802' and OwnerCode to 'BA'
Include valid SelectedOfferItem elements for each offer
Send POST request to OfferPriceRQ endpoint
expected_result: HTTP 200 OK with PricedOffer containing total prices for both selected offers

description: Missing OfferRefID in SelectedOffer returns error
test_steps: Prepare OfferPriceRQ payload with SelectedOfferList containing one SelectedOffer
Omit OfferRefID element
Include valid OwnerCode and SelectedOfferItem elements
Send POST request to OfferPriceRQ endpoint
expected_result: HTTP 400 Bad Request with error message indicating OfferRefID is required
